entry.title: The Imperial 'Elites' of Oxford University (Oxford & Empire)

media:group.media:title: The Imperial 'Elites' of Oxford University (Oxford & Empire)
media:group.media:description:
Special Thanks to Uncomfortable Oxford which is a student lead organization at Oxford providing historical tours in the city. Some of their tours focus on the ‘uncomfortable’ imperial legacy of the University of Oxford (hence the name). They were kind enough to provide me two tours, free of charge, in order that I could learn more about this topic for this video. I highly recommend booking a tour on their website if you’re interested- https://www.uncomfortableoxford.co.uk/
Sources for all my videos are in the bibliography of my scripts available for free to download on my Patreon- https://www.patreon.com/mlaser?filters[tag]=script
My Patreon- https://www.patreon.com/mlaser
If you want to directly donate money you can do so here on YouTube or on Ko-Fi- https://ko-fi.com/mlaserhistory
My Twitter- https://twitter.com/MnLaser
My second channel M. Laser Random- https://www.youtube.com/c/MLaser2 where I just upload random videos from game-plays to vlogs and more.
Creative Commons Videos used in this video -https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=houlHzJNnag -https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PI7XaeaMCtQ&ab_channel=EtherealSound -https://youtu.be/4yVpJFsWwAA -https://youtu.be/c6UNV7gJt8Y Rhodes Must Fall protest video https://rmfoxford.wordpress.com/ Music comes from Epidemic Sounds https://www.epidemicsound.com/
0:00 Introduction 2:16 Early Empire and the University 11:15 University Finances/Imperial Investments/Artifacts 14:41 Oxford Judges & the Empire 18:38 Imperial Ideology & the University 24:45 University as the Educator of Imperial 'Elites' 29:57 Oxford University Press & the Empire 31:34 Oxford and Southern Africa 36:32 Colonial Students' Experiences at Oxford 39:25 21st Century Oxford 40:20 History vs Memory 45:10 End Card _________________________________________________________________ Thank you to my Duke tier Patreons -Sahni -DaneToast -Daniel Garza -Brandon Weller -Rare Rirorie _________________________________________________________________ #empire #history #universityofoxford #oxford #legacy #britishempire #british

entry.title: Putin’s Inaccurate Historical Propaganda : The History of the Russian and Ukrainian Relations

media:group.media:title: Putin’s Inaccurate Historical Propaganda : The History of the Russian and Ukrainian Relations
media:group.media:description:
Links to humanitarian organizations helping Ukrainian Refugees.
RESOURCES FOR UKRAINIAN REFUGEES AND SUPPORTERS -https://docs.google.com/document/u/1/d/1OlZIz-72A2xI2uUOFE07L5ObQGP4JDcXZ2vdIs2P9BQ/mobilebasic
Polish Government Websites for Refugees seeking help -https://www.gov.pl/web/ua -https://pomagamukrainie.gov.pl/
Slovak Government Websites for Refugees seeking help -https://ua.gov.sk/?csrt=17848135974483993656 -https://pomocpreukrajinu.sk/
Estonian Websites helping refugees -https://www.pagulasabi.ee/en
Information for Ukrainians escaping to Germany/Switzerland/Poland -https://www.lphr.org/en/info-flucht/
Romanian Website helping Ukrainian Refugees -https://www.gov.ro/ro/ucraina-impreuna-ajutam-mai-mult#english
Hungarian Website helping Ukrainian Refugees -https://helsinki.hu/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/HHC_Ukraine_Guide_2022_03_09_UA.pdf
Websites to help find shelter for Ukrainians across Europe. -https://www.eu4ua.org/ -https://www.facebook.com/UkrainiansFindAHost/ -https://www.ukraineshelter.com/en?fbclid=IwAR151Pa0UUvO1ANt-Px39Ybr_4Yophfz8NkgFqvNSOqg9-kFVEwM4ej6I5c -https://www.host4ukraine.com/ -https://everybedhelps.com/?fbclid=IwAR10RsNpeR3TD1sfYLzA7DJzylOSEZSQxbbvMFQ1zhgB1v9E1U0ISccA6Mc -https://www.ukrainenow.org/looking-for-help-abroad -https://wunderflats.com/page/ukraine/tenants-in-need-ua
How you can help Ukraine- https://how-to-help-ukraine-now.super.site/ Links to donate to various Ukrainian Institutions- https://help-ukraine.carrd.co/
With the help of my friends and other humanitarian organizations I tried my best to find as many links and as much information as possible. If there are any problems with the information provided or you have extra information you would like to add please share them in the comments.

media:group.media:title: Aztec Human Sacrifices
media:group.media:description:
I originally uploaded two videos. One where I complained about demonetization and one where I didn't. The video where I complained about demonetization was, ironically, monetized and the one without the complaining was demonetized. Hence I am leaving the complaining in the video hoping that it will stay monetized.
Stefan's video has been released but the topic of the video has changed from what it original was supposed to be (about the archaeology of human sacrifices) but it's still a great video and you should check it out. -https://youtu.be/FVgNulhQ9Fg
My Patreon- https://www.patreon.com/mlaser
If you want to directly donate money you can do so on Ko-Fi- https://ko-fi.com/mlaserhistory
My Twitter- https://twitter.com/MnLaser
My second channel M. Laser Random- https://www.youtube.com/c/MLaser2 where I just upload random videos from game-plays to vlogs and more.
Sources for all my videos are in the bibliography of my scripts available for free to download on my Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/mlaser?filters[tag]=script
I actually had way more comments for this video than I could fit into the pinned comment (it has a 10k character limit) so, I recommend downloading the script and reading all the extra comments if you're interested.
Since I have not gone into much detail about the actual political history of the Mexica in this video as the video focused on the topic of human sacrifices, I do recommend checking out Invicta's video and QnA podcast on the subject. There are some mistakes (as there always are, nothing is perfect) but over all I think it is a very good introduction into the Mexican history. Video- https://youtu.be/8a8SkSYtHXo QnA- https://youtu.be/g4mFK5AFP7s
0:00 Introduction 2:52 Intro to "Aztec" Religion 6:04 Intro to "Aztec" Sacrifices 8:15 Heart-Extraction Sacrifice 16:52 God Impersonator Sacrifice 19:15 Intro to the Historical Theories 20:01 Ecological Argument 21:23 Political Argument 23:58 Conclusion to the Sacrifices and Theories 26:20 Problems With the Source Material 33:53 Conclusion
!!!!!!!!!!!!! Extra information and Corrections that didn't fit into the Pinned Comment !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
- For the creation myth I seemed to have confused the fact that Huitzilopochtli, even though being the sun god (maybe), was not the god that sacrificed himself to be the sun in the fifth iteration of the sun. Basically Huitzilopochtli did not sacrifice himself to be the sun as I said in the video. Also the whole celestial battle between the sun and the moon was a bit too oversimplified on my part as to be really accurate. See the long comment I "hearted" in the description by MajoraZ for more information on this.
- For more context into the religious continuum I talk about in the pinned comment see Zuyuano Regime.
- The Itzcoatl quote does not say 'history' but 'paintings' but the Aztecs called their codices paintings as that's partly what they where and in the context of the quote it most definitely means history when it says paintings. That's why for the sake of clarity I amended the quote. The king was also helped in this or persuaded to do this by the chief Mexica advisor at the time Tlacaelel. It is also argued it was Tlacaelel who helped established the whole imperial cult. Durán, Diego, Doris. Heyden, and Fernando Horcasitas. The Aztecs : The History of the Indies of New Spain. New York: Orion Press, 1964. p. 141.
Thanks to @Aztlan Historian and MajoraZ for pointing out the mistakes in the video. _________________________________________________________________ Duke tier Patreons -Sahni -DaneToast _________________________________________________________________ #History #Mexico #Aztecs #Mexica

media:group.media:title: M. Laser History 100k QnA
media:group.media:description:
My Patreon- https://www.patreon.com/mlaser
My second channel M. Laser Random- https://www.youtube.com/c/MLaser2 where I just upload random videos from game-plays to vlogs and more.
My Twitter- https://twitter.com/MnLaser
0:00 Intro 0:43 Vodka or Rakija? 0:47 UNIVERSITY? 0:55 What events do you think were the biggest game changers for Eastern Europe throughout history? 1:38 What is your favourite area of history to look into? What's your favourite time period of history and why? 3:01 Would you consider doing any alternate history videos? 3:10 How did you get interested into history? What started your love for history? 4:10 Explain historical relativism. Why should/shouldn’t we apply it when evaluating historical figures? In your opinion, what are some pros and cons to historical relativism? 9:39 Lost historical works you'd love the most to get your hands on? I'd love to read the memoirs of Sulla, such an interesting guy! 11:02 Is hot dog a sandwich? 11:05 OMG would you defeat a horse size duck? 11:17 What is your favorite song? 11:48 What books would you recommend about History? (It can be any period/topic) 13:07 Why'd you start, and what helps you keep going? 15:03 What are the books you have used frequently in your videos as reference and/or research? What are some positives and negatives you would personally say about each of them? 17:17 What is one area of history that you would like to learn more about? 17:40 Has your general view of history or worldview changed since you've started doing history youtube? If so, are there any videos you found especially influential, or did these changes come about gradually and in the background? 18:41 Favourite type of cheese? 19:10 What YouTube channels do you watch the most? 19:22 What was your most challenging video to make? 20:12 What type of videos would you like to make but can’t because of lack of views/YouTube disliking it? 22:45 What type of videos would you like to make but can’t because of lack of views/YouTube disliking it? _________________________________________________________________ Duke tier Patreons -Sahni _________________________________________________________________ #History #QnA #MLaser
